title: Broken appointment
creator_credit: Willard Van Dyke, Irving Jacoby, Mental Health Film Board and Affiliated Film Producers
brief_description: Shows the development of a young public health nurse to a mature realization of the importance of human contact between the professional and the patient and an understanding that emotional difficulties can interfere with physical welfare. The film describes the experience of a public health nurse who is attached to a baby health clinic. During the course of her work, the nurse helps a young mother to overcome the fears and worries associated with childbirth.
